testcase.name: Verify Power User is redirected to correct page when click in Home icon
testcase.summary:
Given I am a Power User

And I access the Scout Tool

And I navigate to another page different from my Home Page

When I click on 'Dell Scout Cloud Tool' logo icon

Then I am redirected to REVIEWS -> REVIEWS -> Active reviews page

testcase.name: Verify Auditor is redirected to correct page when click in Home icon
testcase.summary:
Given I am an Auditor
And I access the Scout Tool
And I navigate to another page different from my Home Page
When I click on 'Dell Scout Cloud Tool' logo icon
Then I am redirected to REVIEWS -> REVIEWS -> Active reviews page

testcase.name: Verify Profile Owner is redirected to correct page when click in Home icon
testcase.summary:
Given I am a Profile Owner
And I access the Scout Tool
And I navigate to another page different from my Home Page (Quarter Review Tasks Page)
When I click on 'Dell Scout Cloud Tool' logo icon
Then I am redirected to Review Tasks page (Quarter Review Tasks Page)

testcase.summary:

When I click on 'Dell Scout Cloud Tool' logo icon
Then I am redirected to Movement Review Tasks page

Given I am a Matrix Owner
